node.description: Search and retrieve papers from arXiv.org

max_results.info: Maximum number of results to return
max_results.name: max_results

search_query.info: The search query for arXiv papers (e.g., 'quantum computing')
search_query.name: search_query

node.description: Display a chat message in the Playground.

clean_data.info: Whether to clean data before converting to string.
clean_data.name: clean_data

context_id.info: The context ID of the chat. Adds an extra layer to the local memory.
context_id.name: context_id

data_template.info: Template to convert Data to Text. If left empty, it will be dynamically set to the Data's text key.
data_template.name: data_template

input_value.info: Message to be passed as output.
input_value.name: input_value

session_id.info: The session ID of the chat. If empty, the current session ID parameter will be used.
session_id.name: session_id

should_store_message.info: Store the message in the history.
should_store_message.name: should_store_message

context_id.info: The context ID of the chat. Adds an extra layer to the local memory.
context_id.name: context_id

files.info: Files to be sent with the message.
files.name: files

input_value.name: input_value

node.description:
# **Langflow Loop Component Template - ArXiv search result Translator** 
This template translates research paper summaries on ArXiv into Portuguese and summarizes them. 
 Using **Langflow’s looping mechanism**, the template iterates through multiple research papers, translates them with the **OpenAI** model component, and outputs an aggregated version of all translated papers.  

## Quickstart 
 1. Add your OpenAI API key to the **Language Model** component. 
2. In the **Playground**, enter a query related to a research topic (for example, “Quantum Computing Advancements”).  

  The flow fetches a list of research papers from ArXiv matching the query. Each paper in the retrieved list is processed one-by-one using the Langflow **Loop component**. 

  The abstract of each paper is translated into Portuguese by the **OpenAI** model component. 

 Once all papers are translated, the system aggregates them into a **single structured output**.
Runs a language model given a specified provider.

base_url_ibm_watsonx.info: The base URL of the API (IBM watsonx.ai only)
base_url_ibm_watsonx.name: base_url_ibm_watsonx

input_value.info: The input text to send to the model
input_value.name: input_value

ollama_base_url.info: Endpoint of the Ollama API (Ollama only). Defaults to http://localhost:11434
ollama_base_url.name: ollama_base_url

project_id.info: The project ID associated with the foundation model (IBM watsonx.ai only)
project_id.name: project_id

system_message.info: A system message that helps set the behavior of the assistant
system_message.name: system_message

node.description: Iterates over a list of Data or Message objects, outputting one item at a time and aggregating results from loop inputs. Message objects are automatically converted to Data objects for consistent processing.

data.info: The initial DataFrame to iterate over.
data.name: data

input_data.info: Accepts either a DataFrame or a Data object.
input_data.name: input_data

mode.info: Convert into raw string instead of using a template.
mode.name: mode

pattern.info: Use variables within curly brackets to extract column values for DataFrames or key values for Data.For example: `Name: {Name}, Age: {Age}, Country: {Country}`
pattern.name: pattern

description: This template iterates over search results using LoopComponent and translates each result into Portuguese automatically. 🚀
name: Research Translation Loop
